overview: Evan Marriott, former underwear model and star of the 2003 Fox "stunt" series Joe Millionaire, transitions to feature film roles with the direct-to-video action opus End of all Things. Marriott plays an actor questioned by the feds about a government-led scheme to obliterate the world. He decides to go one-on-one against the system to topple the plot once and for all.
title: End of All Things
